I was impressed not only by the atmosphere downstairs, but also with the restaurant/club West on the upper level. What a "posh" place this is! The staff really seem to enjoy themselves. My husband and I will definitely be returning soon. Thank you for a great weekend. -Shannon

Reviews.Title: “This hotel totally exceeded our expectations!”
Reviews.Author: pacol
Reviews.Content: From the very beginning, we were given above standard service. The staff were kind and courteous. In our case we were guests because I was having a medical appointment at UCLA Medical Center. We booked for one night, but after our appointment I felt I needed another night. They had no problem meeting our needs. We immediately were escorted to a new room. The rooms were beautifully decorated and the beds were clean and comfortable. The wide screen HD tv was very cool. The toiletries were of good quality which is always a nice surprise. The room service was great and the food was delicious. I was too ill to go to the on -site restaurant, but by our next appointment I definitely plan to enjoy a yummy dinner on the 17th floor. Again,, the staff are what makes a hotel stay what it is and these staff were just the greatest!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, cool ambiance”
Reviews.Author: srtravels4work
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at the Angelino several times, and really like the feel of the place. It has a modern Asian feel to the decor and the rooms are clean and fairly spacious. Staff is very helpful, and I'm told the restaurant is excellent. Very convenient to UCLA or anywhere on the West side of LA. Try to stay on the quiet side, as the freeway noise (it's over the 405 freeway) can be loud.

Reviews.Title: “cool 17th floor restaurant”
Reviews.Author: shellNottingham
Reviews.Content: The top floor restaurant was v. special delicious food and great service. We even spotted a celebrity in the bar!

Reviews.Title: “2nd Stay, Better Than the First”
Reviews.Author: kwirboi
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at the Angeleno and while there was nothing wrong with my first stay, the hotel was still being remodeled at that time. During this stay, it appears everything was in order as the pool was open, there were lots of employees and the coffee shop was new. Check-in was a breeze and my room was outstanding; comfy bed, flat screen TV and a great view. I loved the bathroom, including the European-style shower. My room faced the 405 and I was a bit concerned about the freeway noise, but as soon as the I shut the sliding glass door, I couldn't hear a thing. Their local shuttle is handy and the hotel is also on the #2 bus line, so the Westwood theatres and the Sunset Strip are just a short ride away. The maid service was outstanding and I loved the bed turn-down service at night. I do have to chuckle, while checking in, there was an elderly man who had a bit of a problem with his room. It seems he just wasn't comfortable with the "openness" of the shower stall (glassed in, no shower curtain) and the opaque glass door of the bathroom. The manager was trying to explain that the hotel has a modern/chic look and feel, but I guess that might be too much for someone who is a bit more consertavie. Overall, the hotel, staff and location are great! The next time I'm in LA, I'll book there again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful service at Hotel Angeleno”
Reviews.Author: ttraveleer
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hotel Angeleno while going to the UCLA clinic. We have used this hotel many times before the change in ownership. Was very pleasantly surprised to find they could do such a wonderful upgrade. The Hotel was impressive starting with the front desk, very friendly and helpful, ending with the immaculate,tastefully decorated rooms. Every aspect of the hotel is first class. Will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value in LA”
Reviews.Author: clubsidem
Reviews.Content: I normally stay at high end properties but after seeing a review in one of the travel magazines, I decided to give The Angelenos a try. Although the room is small, a complete renovation had been completed. The room was spotless and the bed was extremely comfortable. The bathroom was laid out well. We ate at the restaurant West and once at the bar and was completely satisfied both times. The location is central to everywhere with access to the 405 close by. The staff was pleasant and attentive and any request was dealt with immediately. Would highyl reccommend this property.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: RoseAJackson
Reviews.Content: This hotel was excellent. We dined in their restaurant and found it to be wonderful. The hotel rooms were clean, the location great and the staff very courteous. We will be staying at this property again and again.
